de.spricom.dessert.slicing

Class Classpath

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.AbstractSlice
      • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.AbstractRootSlice
        • de.spricom.dessert.slicing.Classpath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Slice

    public final class Classpath
extends AbstractRootSlice
    The Classpath is the start-point for any dessert unit-test. All slices used within a test are created from the Classpath.

    Important:All slices used for assertions must stem from the same Classpath. Otherwise the behaviour is undefined.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Classpath

        public Classpath()
        Creates a Classpath instance by using the default resolver. Thus, the resulting Classpath contains all directories and .jar files found on the path given by the java.class.path system property.

      • Classpath

        public Classpath(ClassResolver resolver)
        Creates a Classpath with some custom resolver. With this method any custom ClassPath can be created.
        Parameters:
        resolver - the resolver to resolve the classes

    • Method Detail

      • asClazz

        public Clazz asClazz(String classname)
        Creates a Clazz form a classname. Returns the first matching class on this classpath, if there is one. If no such class could be found it tries to use the current ClassLoader to look up the class. Of both fail a place-holder object will be returned that contains nothing but the classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - the classname
        Returns:
        the Clazz

      • asClazz

        public Clazz asClazz(Class<?> classImpl)
        Creates a Clazz form a Java Class. Returns a Clazz matching exactly to the passed Class. If there are alternatives on this Classpath they will be linked to the Clazz returned.

        Beware:Creating a Clazz for a Class not found on the current Classpath for which an other class of the same name is on the Classpath my alter an existing Clazz by adding an alternative. This rare case may change the result of duplicates() or specific slice assertions.

        Parameters:
        classImpl - the Java class
        Returns:
        the Clazz

      • duplicates

        public ConcreteSlice duplicates()
        Returns a slice of all duplicate .class files detected by the underlying ClassResolver. Hence, for each entry in this slice there are at least two .class files with the same classname but different URI's.
        Returns:
        Maybe empty slice of all duplicate .class files

      • rootOf

        public Root rootOf(Class<?> clazz)
        Return the Root of some Clazz.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the clazz
        Returns:
        the Root

      • rootOfClass

        public Root rootOfClass(String classname)
        Return the Root of some class given by its classname.
        Parameters:
        classname - the fully qualified name of the class
        Returns:
        the Root

      • rootOf

        public Root rootOf(File rootFile)
        Returns the Root for classes directory or .jar file located on the classpath.
        Parameters:
        rootFile - the file to get the root for
        Returns:
        the Root
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if rootFile could not be found on the classpath

      • sliceOf

        public Slice sliceOf(Class<?>... classes)
        Returns a Slice for a concrete list of Java classes. The classes do not necessarily have to be on this Classpath.
        Parameters:
        classes - the classes
        Returns:
        the slice
        See Also:
        asClazz(Class)
